name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert BOYDEN, Sr., Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert BOYDEN, Sr., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of November, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted limited to the issue of whether or not the trial court erred in denying the suppression motion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 472
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert BOYDEN, Sr., Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 12, 1998.
